comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 10 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.body:

**Tracking methods**:

Block Push API,

Hide your IP address (209.141.53.254),
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests DNS filtering: | disabled Filters: | Ad blocking:

`Don't track me Google (url: https://update.greasyfork.org/scripts/428243/Don't track me Google.user.js)`

### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?adblocking.enabled=true&browsing_security.enabled=true&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=false&custom_filters=User%2520rules%2520%28url%3A%2520none%29%2CKinomerc%EC%9D%98%2520%EC%84%B1%EA%B0%80%EC%8B%AC%2520%EB%AA%A9%EB%A1%9D%2520%28url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fraw.githubusercontent.com%2FKinomerc%2Fannoyinglist_Kinomerc%2Fmain%2Ffilter.txt%29%2CAdGuard%2520Annoyances%2520filter%2520%28url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Ffilters.adtidy.org%2Fwindows%2Ffilters%2F14.txt%29&dns.custom_bootstrap=&dns.custom_fallback=&dns.custom_filters=User%2520rules%2520%28url%3A%2520none%29&dns.enabled=false&dns.fallback_mode=System&dns.filters=&dns.servers=System&dns.timeout=5000&extensions=tinyShield%2520%28script%3B%2520url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.jsdelivr.net%2Fnpm%2F%40list-kr%2Ftinyshield%40latest%2Fdist%2FtinyShield.user.js%29%2CDon%27t%2520track%2520me%2520Google%2520%28script%3B%2520url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fupdate.greasyfork.org%2Fscripts%2F428243%2FDon%2527t%2520track%2520me%2520Google.user.js%29%2CAdGuard%2520Extra%2520%28script%3B%2520url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%2Frelease%2Fadguard-extra%2F1.0%2Fadguard-extra.user.js%29%2CAdGuard%2520Popup%2520Blocker%2520%28script%3B%2520url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%2Frelease%2Fpopup-blocker%2F2.5%2Fpopupblocker.user.js%29%2CGoogle%2520Search%2520Various%2520Ranges%2520%28script%3B%2520url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fupdate.greasyfork.org%2Fscripts%2F31256%2FGoogle%2520Search%2520Various%2520Ranges.user.js%29%2Clinkproduct-privacy%2520%28script%3B%2520url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.jsdelivr.net%2Fgh%2FList-KR%2Flinkproduct-privacy%40main%2Flinkproduct-privacy.user.js%29%2CBypass%2520All%2520Shortlinks%2520Debloated%2520%28script%3B%2520url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fcodeberg.org%2FAmm0ni4%2Fbypass-all-shortlinks-debloated%2Fraw%2Fbranch%2Fmain%2FBypass_All_Shortlinks.user.js%29&extensions.enabled=true&filters=2.3.17.227&license_type=paid&product_type=Win&product_versio comment.body:
Cannot reproduce with your config (except the custom filters list and userscripts).
Please visit https://search.shopping.naver.com and search again.
